column1: At times like this it matters more than ever to have voices with strong national security experience like @ElaineLuriaVA @SpanbergerVA07 @MikieSherrill @ElissaSlotkin @HoulahanForPa in our freshman class. These women are leaders. https://t.co/xSzWTMjXxf

A very Merry Christmas to all who are celebrating today! The holidays are a special time for our family and friends and I hope this is a warm and joyous season of new memories with the ones you love.  May this be a time of peace on earth and good will to all. https://t.co/SI52irJLfy

Tonight Jewish families in the Tenth District and around the world will gather together to light their Menorahs to mark the first night of Hanukkah.  From my family to yours Happy Hanukkah! https://t.co/488vSYwCbW

I am humbled by your support and look forward to fighting beside you in the months ahead to get our message out to voters and ensure our representation in the U.S. Congress continues to reflect the values of our district.
Today we also announced the endorsements of sixty local elected officials and community leaders from across our district. https://t.co/2VZv7BUnFb

It's official! Thanks to our amazing grassroots volunteers our campaign filed more than 3000 petition signatures (nearly four times the requirement) at the State Board of Elections to ensure I'm on the ballot in 2020. 🗳✏️

On #VeteransDay we honor the brave men and women in uniform who risked life and limb so their fellow Americans can enjoy the freedoms and security that too often are taken for granted.  Today and everyday thank you for your service. https://t.co/PbFO3pTIJG

Tonight’s results in KY & VA show what’s possible when we organize and vote. We’re less than a year from Election Day 2020 - and we need to use every day until then to build on this momentum in order to expand our House Majority flip the Senate and take back the White House!
Was proud to stand with my friend and Frontline colleague Elaine Luria to support her work with great local Democrats in Virginia to flip the state legislature blue! https://t.co/TLZMPnD59c

President Trump diverted money from our military to pay for an ineffective border wall that can be overcome with a $100 electric saw. The President's immigration policies are as out of touch with reality as they are with our nation's values. https://t.co/4CH4dH8jF5

The key thing is ... that the candidates are able to get their voices out and voters can hear what our incumbents are saying and understand the work that they're doing on their communities' behalf said Schneider co-chair of DCCC Frontline program - https://t.co/sJVdUHfblj
To all observing Yom Kippur this evening wishing you a Sweet New Year and G’mar Hatima Tova may you be inscribed in the book of life.
From my family to yours I wish all observing Rosh Hashanah this evening a happy healthy and peace-filled new year. L'shanah tovah! https://t.co/N2QCo9Yy0o

I look forward to continuing to work with Chairwoman @CheriBustos & entire DCCC team to support our outstanding Frontline members expand our majority and make progress on the issues that matter to the American people.

Congrats to the new @dccc ED Lucinda Guinn (@lmguinn)! She is a strong and tested choice to lead us into 2020 and I was honored to participate in a search process that included perspectives as diverse as our Democratic Caucus.

This is the result the Trump Administration wanted when it instituted a "gag rule" putting politics above patients. It is part of their continued assault on women's access to reproductive health care. I am proud to #standwithpp & will fight to remove these #TitleX restrictions. https://t.co/Vy5THUoAfp

Lake County is a welcoming place with a rich diversity of people communities and businesses. Mr. Curran’s remarks are shameful and ignorant. His prejudice for the people who proudly call Lake County home should disqualify him as a candidate for Senate or any other office. https://t.co/yDxlE3rAxO
Wishing you and yours a very happy #FathersDay! https://t.co/gz67KohKF4
Proud that Illinois is a national leader in the effort to protect every woman's right to choose. I will continue to stand against attacks on women's access to health care.  https://t.co/ZzwZlv8zMv

Adding a citizenship question is an unconstitutional power grab to give Republicans an unfair electoral advantage for the next decade. We need to activate mobilize and organize to counter this cynical attempt to stack the deck against our communities.  https://t.co/ZNV18oW7gK

.@BetsyforIL is a tireless advocate for affordable health care for all Illinois families. I'm thrilled she's running for Congress and I can't wait for more voters to get to know her and hear her story! https://t.co/GPCdqKgCMi

Congratulations to all the newly elected and re-elected local government leaders here in the Tenth District including Zion Mayor-Elect Billy McKinney Prospect Heights Mayor Nicholas Helmer Highland Park Mayor @NancyRotering and Bannockburn Mayor Frank "Bud" Rothing.
